extendedInfo.description: Soccer Juggle, basic concept turned into an addictive multiplayer experience. With bluetooth phone to phone multiplayer, 2 and 3 player split screen multiplayer, as well as campaign mode and quick play options, this game is highly entertaining.Features:Phone to phone Bluetooth mode. *Local split screen mode. (2 and 3* player)50 Campaign levels. (Levels 21-50)*4 Quick Play modes. (1-Minute timer mode)*Dynamic physics engine, not changes as your combo increases.* = Full version only, not in trial.
